title: How to make breathing in singing better and not run out of breath when singing a song - Quora

response.answer_text: You MUST learn to use your diaphragm to generate the power!!! I taught myself to consciously pull my stomach in CONSTANTLY….starting with normal conversation…if you really try you'll learn control. NOW you can use your lungs for air adjustment to your vocal cords…..never forget, your vocal cords are guitar strings…enjoy the adventure…
Take up swimming. Dimash Kudaibergen, the greatest singer in the world can hold a note for 22–23 seconds without taking a breath has been swimming for years & he just turned 26 years old.
